thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 38 of 3060
thread.title: Meinhard Themel

author: Meinhard Themel
title: Meinhard Themel
text:
At the airport in Jerez, Spain, I picked up my first rental car from FireFly. It was a brand new Citroen Berlingo, which had only run 10 miles! I assume that due to the fair rental prices offered by FireFly, I was not the only customer waiting for a car at the desk, and it took more than half an hour until I was served.
Car return went fast. Next time I will surely look after FireFly again.
